author: Noah Berlatsky
title: We’re learning the big difference between disasters and disaster movies
description: As coronavirus spreads and the death toll rises, movies like Contagion and Outbreak have abruptly become the go-to pandemic quarantine movies of choice. But disaster films — whether they address disease realistically, or metaphorically, like zombie movies or …
